price: Dhugumatti kan kijiba uumu isaan keeyyattoota Rabbiitti hin amanne qofa. Warri sun isaanumatu kijibdoota.
arabic: إِنَّمَا يَفۡتَرِي ٱلۡكَذِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡكَٰذِبُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innamā yaftarī al-kadhiba alladhīna lā yu'minūna biāyāti al-lahi wa-ulāika humu al-kādhibūna
